channel.title: Where you end up when you die
channel.description: i need a code to find where to change where you spawn in death anyone got it?. :D

item.title: Where you end up when you die
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“boomer4456, post:6, topic:275522”][quote author=Newty link=topic=363974.msg2763562#msg2763562 date=1240682091]
Starting location can be changed in Player.java

Respawn location’s are found in Client.java
[/quote]more specific i know where you start but client.java is huge cant find the easily. start player.java ive known that since ages but i need to change death spawn[/quote]

When you die, figure out your X and Y coordinates. Then open up Client.java and search for the coords that you just found, then replace them with the coords of where you want the player to respawn at.

Read full topic
item.source: Where you end up when you die

item.title: Where you end up when you die
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

ok dude. here i’ll post my code, just put your cordinates in it, and search in client.java

catch (Exception e) {} } removeAllItems(); teleportToX = 2956; teleportToY = 3505; // pEmote = 15; // pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you've died."); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
